mapper.select: SELECT id,brand,model,version,every_month_pay pay,cover_pic coverPic FROM `pro_car_type` where id=#{id}
SELECT DISTINCT model FROM `pro_car_type` WHERE brand=#{brand}
SELECT DISTINCT version FROM `pro_car_type` WHERE model=#{model}
SELECT DISTINCT brand FROM `pro_car_type` where putaway=1
SELECT DISTINCT model FROM `pro_car_type` where putaway=1 and brand = #{brand}
SELECT version FROM `pro_car_type` where putaway=1 and brand = #{brand} and model = #{model}

select id,min(cast(first_month_pay as UNSIGNED INTEGER)) firstMonthPay,min(cast(every_month_pay as UNSIGNED INTEGER)) everyMonthPay FROM `pro_car_type` where putaway=1 and brand = #{brand} and model = #{model}
mapper.update: update pro_car_type set putaway=null where id=#{id}
update pro_car_type set putaway='1' where id=#{id}
